metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian6 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette: a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This civilian is named Ch’kk’chk.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the civilian6 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

0.speaker: Ch'kk'ch
0.text: Cool. Seriously cool. My favourite fireworks colour is, like, dark violet, because it's the most cool.
